name: Information security policy
content:
This privacy policy discloses the manner in which we collect, store and process personal information or data (“Personal Information”) of our customers through the website. We are committed to keeping customers' personal information confidential, and will make every effort and use appropriate measures to ensure that the information that customers provide to us while using the website is protected. secure and protected from unauthorized access.

However, we cannot guarantee to prevent all unauthorized access. In the event of unauthorized access beyond our control, the company will not be responsible in any way for any claims, disputes or damages arising from or related to that unauthorized access.

To better understand the policies on the collection, storage and use of personal information of users of this website, please read the privacy policies below:

Purpose and scope of collecting personal information

To access and use some services on the website, you may be asked to register with us personal information (Email, Full name, Contact phone number,...). All declared information must ensure accuracy and legality. Our website does not bear any responsibility related to the law of declared information. We may also collect information about the number of visits, including the number of pages you view, the number of links you click and other information related to connecting to our website. We also collect information that the Web browser you use every time you access the website, including: IP address, Browser type, language used, time and addresses accessed by the Browser. arrive.

Scope of information use

The information collected through the website piger.vn will help us:

Support customers when purchasing products

Answer customer questions

Conduct customer surveys

Carry out promotional activities related to Vietnam's products and services

– Customers who need to request support or have questions that need answering want to transfer information to us through the website piger.vn, you may be asked to register with us personal information (Email, Last Name). name, contact phone number...). All declared information must ensure accuracy and legality. piger.vn does not bear any responsibility related to the law of declared information.

– When necessary, we can use this information to contact you directly in the form of: sending open letters, orders, thank you letters, technical and security information, ... ..

We commit to using customers' personal information in accordance with the purposes and scope announced. In case any scope of use arises beyond the purpose and notice, we will send notice to the Customer and only use it with the Customer's consent.


Information storage time

We will store personal information provided by customers on our internal systems during the process of providing services to customers or until the purpose of collection is completed or when customers request it. request to cancel the information provided.

The people or organizations that may have access to the information

Customers agree that: in case of necessity, the following agencies/organizations/individuals have the right to access and collect their information, including:

Board

Competent state agency

The complaining party can prove the Customer's violation (if any).

Address of the unit that collects and manages personal information

HKD TIGER SHOP

Address: House number 147 Doan Ke Thien Street - Mai Dich Ward - Cau Giay District - Hanoi.

Tax code: 8759843345-001 issued by Cau Giay District Tax Department on June 7, 2022

Business Registration Certificate No. 01G8014598 issued by Cau Giay District People's Committee on May 6, 2014

name: Instructions for using perfume
content:
Step 1: Clean your body

You should shower and clean your body before using perfume because the scent of perfume is fragrant and lasts best on clean skin, not mixed with sweat or body odor. When bathing, use shower gel to moisturize the skin, and remember to dry your body before applying perfume.

Step 2: Choose the right perfume

After showering, you can use lotion or oil to moisturize your skin to help the perfume linger more effectively on dry skin. Then, you need to choose a perfume suitable for the weather and environment to use.

Step 3: Spray on high temperature areas on the body

Start spraying in areas such as behind the ears, neck, chest, wrists, back... spraying distance from 10cm to 15cm. You should spray it on places with blood vessels and high temperatures on the body to help the scent spread better.

Step 4: Let the perfume dry naturally

After applying perfume, let the perfume dry and absorb into the skin naturally. Absolutely do not rub your skin on the area where you just sprayed. This will cause the molecular structure of the perfume to be lost and will reduce the adhesion of the perfume.

Step 5: Spray additional if needed

Depending on the type of perfume, the scent duration is different. However, for perfumes with a short lasting scent, you can re-spray in the middle of the day if the scent is gone.

Correct perfume spray position

Once you know how to apply perfume correctly, you need to understand the most optimal spray positions on your body. These are often places with high body temperature because these locations will help the perfume radiate its scent more strongly. Below are recommended perfume spray locations for men and women.

Correct position to spray perfume for men


Locations where perfume should be sprayed on the male body

Places to spray perfume on men's bodies to help it last longer | Source: FragranceX

Under the chin, neck or back of the neck

The neck and back of the neck are common places to spray perfume because the neck has many blood vessels that will help spread the perfume scent throughout the body and last for a long time. This is usually the default position where everyone should spray at least 1 shot of perfume.

On 2 shoulders

Spraying perfume on both shoulders will help the perfume spread evenly to both sides, allowing people standing next to smell your perfume. However, the scent from this position will be somewhat blocked when you put on the shirt.

On the chest

The chest is a very good place to spray perfume, especially if you wear a shirt, the scent of perfume will creep through the collar and the gaps between the buttons and radiate gently around you. Breasts also have high body temperature, which helps perfume spread better. You should spray 2 shots on both sides of your chest, to help the scent spread more evenly than spraying 1 shot in the middle of your chest. Spraying in the middle of your chest also causes the scent of perfume to go straight to your nose, which can cause discomfort if you smell it continuously all day

On the wrist

The wrist is the position where the scent lasts the longest and is the most common place to spray perfume. Just spray a little perfume on the wrist and the scent will last a long time and spread throughout your body. However, perfume sprayed in this position is easily lost when you wash your hands or do daily activities.

In the arm

The elbow is a good place to spray perfume, especially if you leave your elbow exposed. However, this is not a very optimal position because it does not have high body temperature and is often in contact with the table surface when you sit and work. Instead you should spray inside the elbow or inside the arm. This position has many blood vessels flowing through it, making the perfume smell better

Correct position to spray perfume for women

Correct position to spray perfume for women

Places to spray perfume on men's bodies to help it last longer | Source: FragranceX

Behind the ears

Spray directly on the spot behind the ears to keep the fresh fragrance on your face all day. Especially if you often sweat oil behind your ears, spray a little perfume there. The oil helps preserve the fragrance, and will keep it around your head for hours.

On the neck

The throat and back of the neck are common places to spray perfume because the neck has many blood vessels that will help spread the perfume scent throughout the body and last for a long time. Spraying on the back of your neck will help leave a scent wherever you go. However, if you have already sprayed 2 shots behind the ears, you should switch to spraying in the throat. Spray into the hollow area below your neck to store the fragrance in a pulse point to help the fragrance gently radiate, however you will also directly smell this scent all day and it may somewhat cause discomfort to you.

Behind the knee

Behind the knee is an extremely effective spray location that few people know about. The back of the knee is a congestion point, so on days when you choose to wear skirts or short pants that fall above the knee, spraying perfume on the back of the knee will help the fragrance waft around your lower half. To preserve your fragrance even more, apply perfume immediately after toning your feet after bathing.

On the wrist

The wrist is the position where the scent lasts the longest and is the most popular place to spray perfume. Just spray a little perfume on the wrist, where there are many blood vessels, the scent will linger for a long time and spread throughout your body. .

In the inner elbow

The wrist is a great scent spot, but wrist perfume is easily lost when you live, work or wash your hands. Therefore an alternative

name: Payment Policy
content:
Payment method when purchasing

Delivery method - Pay in cash only applies to areas where we support free delivery Or pay for purchases directly at: House number 147 Doan Ke Thien Street - Mai Dich Ward - Cau Giay District - Ha Noi.

Form of payment in advance

Money transfer, bank transfer, direct cash payment at our office. Form of money transfer/bank transfer 3. Money transfer/bank transfer Applicable to customers outside the free delivery support area. Or customers need to use this payment method.

Company account:

Transfer information at:

Account number: 0963708888

Bank: MB Bank Military Bank

Account holder name: CTK NGUYEN DAC TUAN


Direct payment by cash or card (Visa Card, Credit Card...)

– Please go to the nearest branch to make payment, our staff will guide you. Please note that when making payment, there must be a receipt from the Company, and the signature of the Chief Accountant or Company Director.

*Note: Orders with a value of 20 million VND or more and if you want to issue a VAT invoice, you must transfer money to the company account. Please call the salesperson before moving for further instructions if needed. And only transfer money with the account numbers below to ensure your transactions are most secure.

– In case you pay by Visa or Master card by swiping the card at piger.vn. You must bring the card and the correct cardholder to receive the voucher and sign to receive the paid voucher. (Currently not applicable) We will not be responsible when you use someone else's card to pay.

Immediately after checking and receiving a "YES" message from the Bank via the account holder's phone. We will process the goods and deliver them to you as soon as possible. For any questions or complaints regarding exchange, warranty or technical support, please contact hotline 096 370 8888 for the best support!

name: About
content:
What makes us different ?

VISION

New view with you - Reach new heights

CORE VALUES

Below are the values ​​we aim for, as a leading offshore company

Communication

Proactively dialogue without hesitation

Solution

Offer the most feasible solution, suitable for all needs and circumstances

Relation

Building companionship, sustainable and trustworthy development

History Company

 
2016 /04

Established Evolable Asia Solutions Co., Ltd. at Atago Green Hills building, Tokyo, Japan (EASJ).

Established EAS Lab in Hanoi.

 
2017/ 03
Established Head Office in Ho Chi Minh (Dong Nhan Building).
Month 06
The number of employees reaches 50 people.
Month 11

Established Evolable Asia Solutions Vietnam Co., Ltd (EASV)

 
2018/ 01
Established a branch in Da Nang (Vinh Trung Plaza).
The number of employees reaches 100 people.
 
2019/ 01
The number of employees reaches ~ 300 people
Month 03

Acquired JAPAN TECH Co., Ltd.

Achieved ISO/IEC 27001 certification

Month 04

Repurchase EVOLABLE ASIA Co., Ltd. 

Month 05

Officially changed name to Hybrid Technologies Co., Ltd.

Month 08

Become Gold Partner của ISTQB.

Month 09

Obtain Certification ISO 9001:2015.

Month 12

The number of employees reaches ~ 500 people.

 
2020/ 03

Repurchase Dentsu Techno Camp.

Month 04

The number of employees reaches ~ 700 people.

Month 05

Change Vision - Mission - Core values ​​and new brand identity.

 
2021/ 08

Become Platinum Partner  ISTQB

 
Month 12

Officially listed on the Japanese stock exchange

 
Successful people never stopFind your path

name: Terms of use
content:
Welcome customers to our website.

When you access our website, it means you agree to these terms. The website reserves the right to change, modify, add or remove any portion of these Terms of Sale, at any time. Changes are effective immediately upon posting on the website without prior notice. And when you continue to use the website, after changes to these Terms are posted, it means you accept those changes.

Please check back regularly to update our changes.

Table of contents of the article

1. Instructions for using the website

2. Safe and convenient payment

3. Instructions for using the website

When accessing our website, customers must ensure they are 18 years old, or access under the supervision of a parent or legal guardian. Customers ensure to have full civil acts to carry out goods purchase and sale transactions according to current regulations of Vietnamese law.

During the registration process, you agree to receive promotional e-mails from the website. If you do not want to continue receiving e-mails, you can refuse by clicking on the link at the bottom of every promotional e-mail.


Safe and convenient payment

Buyers can refer to the following payment methods and choose to apply the appropriate method:

Method 1: Direct payment (buyer receives goods at the seller's address)

Method 2: Pay later (COD - delivery and collection)

Method 3: Pay online via bank transfer
